sentences.en: a day of sunny spells and scattered showers
sentences.cn: 间晴且有零星阵雨的一天

sentences.en: a magic spell
sentences.cn: 魔咒

sentences.en: A spell of poor health took the edge off her performance.
sentences.cn: 一度身体欠佳令她表现有失水准。

sentences.en: asked him to spell out his objectives.
sentences.cn: 让他清楚明白地说明他的目的

sentences.en: Be assertive and spell out exactly how you feel.
sentences.cn: 要自信点儿，把自己的感受讲清楚。

sentences.en: Drug experts say it could spell the end of the crack epidemic.
sentences.cn: 禁毒专家说它可能会结束强效可卡因吸食泛滥的局面。

sentences.en: Even sensible Frank had fallen under her spell.
sentences.cn: 甚至连一向理智的弗兰克都被她迷住了。

sentences.en: For many years sundials have cast their spell over scientists and mathematicians.
sentences.cn: 多年来，日晷一直吸引着科学家和数学家们。

sentences.en: He began to suffer from dizzy spells .
sentences.cn: 他开始一阵阵头晕。

sentences.en: How do you spell ‘juice’?
sentences.cn: juice 怎么拼？

sentences.en: How do you spell "potato"?
sentences.cn: potato这个词怎么拼写？

sentences.en: How do you spell your surname?
sentences.cn: 你的姓怎么拼？

sentences.en: How many times do I have to spell it out?
sentences.cn: 我要仔仔细细讲多少遍？

sentences.en: I never have to spell out my first name.
sentences.cn: 我从不需要将我的名拼读出来。

sentences.en: It's shocking how students can't spell these days.
sentences.cn: 当今的学生们拼写上差得令人吃惊。

sentences.en: Jacqueline is not relishing the prospect of another spell in prison.
sentences.cn: 杰奎琳可不想再蹲一阵子监狱。

sentences.en: People said he was able to cast a spell on the public.
sentences.cn: 人们说他能吸引公众。

sentences.en: Pupils should know how to spell commonly used words.
sentences.cn: 小学生应该知道常用词的拼法。

sentences.en: The heartless witch cast a spell on the poor little girl.
sentences.cn: 狠心的女巫对孤苦无助的小女孩施了妖术.

sentences.en: The kiss of the prince broke the spell (= stopped the magic from working ) .
sentences.cn: 王子的吻解除了魔咒。

sentences.en: They were impoverished by a prolonged spell of unemployment.
sentences.cn: 他们因长期失业而一贫如洗.

sentences.en: You accused me of inaccuracy yet you can't spell "Middlesex".
sentences.cn: 你说我不够准确，但你自己却不会拼写Middlesex。

words.tran_cn: 拼写；意味着（spell的ing形式）；迷住
拼，拼写；意味着；招致；拼成；迷住；轮值

phrases.tran_cn: 符咒书（小说中特有名词）；图书说明
解除疑惑；经研究而理解
把组成一个词的字母依次读出
受某人魔力般的影响；对某人着迷

trans.tran_en: a piece of magic that someone does, or the special words or ceremonies used in doing it
to form a word by writing or naming the letters in order
